pullrequest.title: Switched ode/bullet tests to value-parameterized tests

content.raw:
What about using a macro to avoid repeating all that instantiate lines and make it easier to maintain changes in the future?

I did an example in commit a3c723a. Feel free to merge from ```parameterized_tests_helper_macro``` and change the rest of tests if you found it useful.
content.html:
